headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HAUGE, HELEN RESOR

lead_paragraph: HAUGE--Helen Resor. The Board of Directors and staff of Henry Street Settlement mourn the loss of Honorary Board Member Helen R. Hauge, who served as a long standing supporter and tireless advocate of our social service programs. We extend our deepest condolences to her family.
